body.name: LEARNING ADVANTAGE Transportation Linking Blocks - Set of 36 - Ages 18m+ - Pop Beads for Toddlers - Early Sensory and Fine Motor Toy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 7 hrs 17 mins
features: EASY TO USE AND HIGH QUALITY -- This set is designed for toddlers and preschoolers. It includes 36 hollow connecting snap lock beads in 3 shapes: planes, trains and boats.
SAFE SNAP BEADS FOR AGES 18m+ -- Transportation Linking Blocks are jumbo-sized and made of durable plastic which is BPA, PVC and latex-free.
DESIGNED FOR LITTLE LEARNERS -- At 3”L x 0.75”W, these pop beads are large enough for girls and boys to easily connect and disconnect. They're perfect as a first popbeads toy and a great gift idea!
BUILD FINE MOTOR SKILLS -- Toddlers love to snap these connecting toys together and then pull them apart with a "pop". As the boy, girl or toddler plays, they’ll develop dexterity and hand strength.
COUNT, SORT AND SEQUENCE -- With 3 shapes and 4 colors, this snaplock bead kit encourages early math skills.
CONSTRUCT AND CREATE -- Children can connect the blocks to construct necklaces, bracelets and more! Once connected, these blocks stay together. That means creations will, too!
body.description: Snap together, pull apart, sort and sequence these Transportation Linking Blocks. This set includes 36 hollow beads in 3 shapes: boats, planes and trains and 4 colors: blue, green, red and yellow. Develop fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination as toddlers make chains, necklaces and more! These snap beads have been developed for 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 year old kids. Teach your kid to count and sort by shape or color to practice early math skills. These pop beads are easy for little hands to manipulate, which makes them perfect for play at home or preschool. Transportation Linking Blocks are BPA, PVC and latex-free. || Size: 3”L x 2.5”H x 0.75”D.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All Aboard for Counting, Sorting and Sequencing! Easy for small hands to use This set includes 36 hollow blocks which “snap” together and “pop” apart. The airplanes, boats and cars come in four different colors: blue, green, red and yellow. A pop beads voyage! There are 3 shapes and 4 colors to count, sort and sequence. Create necklaces and bracelets, too! These blocks stay connected until it’s time for the next creation. Safe for ages 18m+ At 3”L x 0.75”D, these connecting toys are safe for toddlers aged 18m+. Transportation Linking Blocks are made of durable plastic which is BPA, PVC and latex-free
This set includes 36 hollow, plastic connecting blocks in 3 shapes: airplanes, trains and boats. Size: 3”L x 2.5”H x 0.75”D.

Tactile Blocks - Set of 49 Crocodile Activity Wall Panel Horse Activity Wall Panel Beads & Laces Description A colorful construction toy featuring flexible blocks with soft bristles in blue, green, red and yellow. This wooden wall panel includes 11 different puzzles and effects - instruments, mazes, interlocking cogs and more! A wooden stallion with moving beads on a wire maze with a launch lever and a four-cog system. Help children develop fine motor and patterning skills with this classic activity featuring 108 hardwood beads in 3 shapes plus 2 laces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 3yr old loves these!
reviews.reviewText: We had a set for my daughter, and they became my sons when he got old enough for them, and he’s obsessed. So for his 3rd birthday I got him this set to add to the previous. They were exactly the same as the prior, just different colors (not sure where we got my daughters set that’s pastel) the connectors hold well and he makes a big “train” of them and walks around the house with it. Great toy for toddlers that is basic but keeps them interested and teaches fine motor skills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Christmas present
reviews.reviewText: Liked the durability for little ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars grandson loves them
reviews.reviewText: easy to pop together, very colorful, perfect size for small hands

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Trains, boats and airplane linking blocks
reviews.reviewText: When I was younger, I had linking blocks that were cylinder/round shaped. These linking blocks are similar. They are strong and sturdy and so far, have been able to withstand my very strong and curious toddler. The only downside to these is that they are very hard and a bit difficult to connect. I have to connect them for my son. Overall, a great investment for my son’s development.

reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I was looking for! Great for my toddlers! Easy to snap together and apart! Cute colors & shapes!
